metadata.name: Generate AI Agent Instructions
metadata.shortDescription: Analyze codebase to generate platform-agnostic AI agent instruction files (AGENTS.md, .cursorrules, .windsurfrules, .kiro/steering, etc.)
metadata.description: Systematically analyze codebase structure, architecture, patterns, and workflows to generate comprehensive instruction files that help AI coding assistants understand project-specific conventions, critical patterns, and development workflows across multiple platforms (GitHub Copilot, Cursor, Windsurf, Cline, Kiro)
objectives: Auto-detect existing AI instruction files across multiple platforms
Analyze codebase architecture, patterns, and workflows systematically
Generate platform-appropriate instruction files with project-specific guidance
Merge and preserve valuable content from existing instruction files
Produce concise (150-250 lines) AI-optimized documentation with real file references
metadata.author: Pascal Paccaud

technical_requirements.recommended_llm: Claude Sonnet 3.5+ or GPT-4 (requires strong codebase analysis capabilities)
technical_requirements.tool_dependency: Requires access to workspace file system for codebase analysis

prompts.name: generate-ai-agent-instructions
prompts.description: Main prompt for generating AI agent instruction files across platforms
